entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 07:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: WNW 40 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to a few flurries this morning and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
